page.name: Shattered
page.description: The Darkness is pushing through... it needs to learn, to find out, how to finally bring the endless night back to this Universe.

properties.name: Shattered
properties.description: The Darkness is pushing through... it needs to learn, to find out, how to finally bring the endless night back to this Universe.
properties.complete: The shattered dust of the Ultimate Orb... and memories of those who would defeat the Darkness.

page.description: A sword with an enchanted blade which was forged from the fabric of night itself.
